htmlBody: FYI, the folks at Invincible Wellbeing are working on essentially this question. Some of their draft research is available for viewing, but I don't think they have anything fully published yet.

Hi Alamo,

FYI, I have done a simple BOTEC for something similar to what you are suggesting here (see 1st table).
Thanks, I see it's very hard to think of something that hasn't been already thought of by EAs. By coincidence, I've just seen a post by 'Rethink Priorities' on the subject.
